attributes.action: BENEFIT CLAIMANTS CONVICTED OF ILLEGAL ACTS SHOULD LOOSE ALL BENEFITS
attributes.additional_details:
All benefit claimants who are convicted of illegal acts that have harmed/affected their local community should have all benefits and entitlements revoked.

Why should hard working tax payers who are already struggling under the current financial climate have to contribute to the benefits system to keep people who have broken the law??

All such people should have ALL benefits removed and be denied any future entitlements to benefits.  Why should we pay for criminals??
